FlowRecordVersionOccurrence.name: FlowRecordVersionOccurrence
FlowRecordVersionOccurrence.description: Represents an instance of a recurring flow that runs on a schedule.

Entries.description: The number of entries for this occurrence.

Errors.description: The number of errors for this occurrence.

ErrorDetail.description: A description of the error. This field is available in API version 63.0 and later.

Exits.description: The number of exits for this occurrence.

FlowRecordId.description: The ID of the associated flow record.

FlowRecordVersionId.description: The ID of the associated version of the flow record.

ProgressStatus.description: The running status of the flow interview.

ScheduledDate.description: The scheduled time and date of the occurrence.

Stopped.description: The number of flows that were stopped for this occurrence.
